price: On that Day they will offer submission to Allah[55], and all what they used to fabricate will vanish from them.
arabic: وَأَلۡقَوۡاْ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ يَوۡمَئِذٍ ٱلسَّلَمَۖ وَضَلَّ عَنۡهُم مَّا كَانُواْ يَفۡتَرُونَ
footnotes: [55] They then realize that they deserve the punishment.
